mlr3mbspls: Multi-Block Sparse PLS for mlr3

Source: R/mlr3mbspls-package.R
mlr3mbspls-package.Rd

Integration of multi-block sparse partial least squares (MB-sPLS) with the mlr3 machine learning framework. This package provides custom PipeOp components for MB-sPLS projection and dimensionality reduction in multi-block data analysis workflows, with support for classification and clustering pipelines.

Key Features

  • Custom PipeOpMBsPLS for dimensionality reduction

  • Multi-block task creation with block membership tracking

  • Integration with mlr3pipelines for complex workflows

  • Visualization and interpretation tools

  • Hyperparameter tuning support

Main Functions

  • PipeOpMBsPLS: Main PipeOp for MB-sPLS transformation

  • PipeOpSiteCorrection: Site/batch correction as a PipeOp

  • mbspls_graph: Construct a full preprocessing + MB-sPLS graph

  • mbspls_graph_learner: Wrap a graph as a GraphLearner

  • mbspls_eval_new_data: Evaluate new data via a trained graph

  • mbspls_nested_cv / mbspls_nested_cv_batchtools: Nested resampling utilities

See also
